document_data.caption: A sample of lakh resin.
document_data.name: Lakh resin
document_data.mainbody: '''Lakh resin''' was a [[resin]]ous substance produced by the [[lakh]] bug.
document_data.Usage: Lakh resin was dissolved in [[terebinth]] and made into a kind of [[varnish]] or shellac used for sealing and finishing wood, preserving the material from hot, humid conditions found in places such as in Chult.
